comments_since_last_sample.body: This convoluted, stupid kind of gaming peripherals/unlockables is what I live for
Wow this kind of makes me want to obtain a N64DD. Great video Derek! I'd love to see more videos about the DD!!

You probably had to yell into the microphone because it was calibrated for a line level signal and not a lower mic-level signal. You could have put the microphone through a mixer and used the line out there, possibly.
How much money would have Derek spent, if he actually had to buy all the equipment? 1K? 2K?
